Title: Establishes a tax credit for personal property replacement as a result of bedbug infestation
Summary: Establishes a tax credit for personal property replacement as a result of bedbug infestation; credit of 15% not to exceed $750; certification determined by commissioner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for personal property replacement as a result of bedbug infestation
